text: Tomadera jan'ya harama kara hayeche [1] tomadera ma [2], meye [3], bona [4], phuphu [5], khala [6], bha'iyera meye [7], bonera meye [8], dudhama [9], dudhabona [10], sasuri o tomadera stridera madhye yara sathe sangata hayecha tara agera sbamira aurase tara garbhajata meye, yara tomadera abhibhabakatbe ache [11], tabe yadi tadera sathe sangata na haye thaka tate tomadera kono aparadha ne'i. Ara tomadera jan'ya nisid'dha tomadera aurasajata chelera stri [12] o du'i bonake ekatra kara, age ya hayeche ta chara[13]. Niscaya'i allaha ksamasila, parama dayalu
